question: Comet Encke orbits the sun every 65 years. Michael's grandfather saw the Comet when he was 25 years old. Michael saw the comet a second time when he was three times the age his grandfather was when he saw the Comet. How old was Michael when he saw the Comet for the first time?
answer:
Michael saw the Comet for the second time when he was 25 years * 3= <<25*3=75>>75 years old.
Comet Encke can be seen every 65 years, so Michael saw the comet for the first time when he was 75 years - 65 years = <<75-65=10>>10 years old.
#### 10
